EmailTemplate.description: Notification to the participant, informing that they need to answer (This will fire if the status != Confirmed and one week before the event)
EmailTemplate.name: ERM Participant notification - Reminder to confirm presence
EmailTemplate.subject: ERM: Please confirm {!Event_Registration__c.Name} presence on {!Event_Registration__c.Event__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Colleague,
Please confirm or decline the attendance of {!Event_Registration__c.Name} for the {!Event_Registration__c.Event__c} by changing the status to 'confirmed' or 'declined'.
Please click on this link to change status.
Click here to see how to change status to 'confirmed' or 'declined' in sCRM.
